outputs.output_descr:
Communities empowered to increase production capacity of 10,000 households, conflict prevention and peace building in 16 sub-counties through access to basic services , land and increased capacity of district Local Governments to implement participatory development management.
-Increased Agricultural production and productivity of 6,000 households through provision of agricultural inputs and training,increased opportunities of 2000 households through non-agriculture skill training and access to savings,  financial resources as well as increase in marketable surplus of staple foods and increase in  incomes of the 2000 farmer households.
-Access to medical services, early detection and prompt response to epidemic outbreaks and access to life saving preventive interventions in the project area, as well as extending humanitarian response , supporting  return and  early recovery activities and  ensuring that they are well coordinated.
-Ensuring that at least 480 women and youth from 16 peace rings are engaged in participatory reconciliation and peace building initiatives.

project_descr: Northern Uganda Early Recovery Project in Lira& Oyam District to empower Communities production/livelihood capacity
project_title: Northern Uganda Early Recovery in-Lira & Oyam Districts
